IntegrationRuntimeList.description: A list of integration runtime resources.

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of results, if any remaining results exist.

IntegrationRuntime.description: Purview nested object which serves as a compute resource for activities.

ManagedIntegrationRuntimeComputeProperti.description: The compute resource properties for managed integration runtime.

location.description: The location for managed integration runtime.

SelfHostedIntegrationRuntimeNode.description: Properties of Self-hosted integration runtime node.

nodeName.description: Name of the integration runtime node.

machineName.description: Machine name of the integration runtime node.

hostServiceUri.description: URI for the host machine of the integration runtime.

status.description: Status of the integration runtime node.

additionalProperties.description: The capability details of self-hosted integration runtime node.

versionStatus.description: Status of the integration runtime node version.

version.description: Version of the integration runtime node.

registerTime.description: The time at which the integration runtime node was registered in ISO8601 format.

lastConnectTime.description: The most recent time at which the integration runtime was connected in ISO8601 format.

expiryTime.description: The time at which the integration runtime will expire in ISO8601 format.

lastStartTime.description: The time the node last started up.

lastStopTime.description: The integration runtime node last stop time.

lastUpdateResult.description: The result of the last integration runtime node update.

lastStartUpdateTime.description: The last time for the integration runtime node update start.

lastEndUpdateTime.description: The last time for the integration runtime node update end.

isActiveDispatcher.description: Indicates whether this node is the active dispatcher for integration runtime requests.

concurrentJobsLimit.description: The concurrent jobs limit of self-hosted integration runtime node.

maxConcurrentJobs.description: The max concurrent jobs of self-hosted integration runtime node.

SelfHostedIntegrationRuntimeStatusTypePr.description: Self-hosted integration runtime status type properties.

createTime.description: The time at which the integration runtime was created, in ISO8601 format.

taskQueueId.description: The task queue id of the integration runtime.

internalChannelEncryption.description: It is used to set the encryption mode for node-node communication channel (when more than 2 self-hosted integration runtime nodes exist).

nodes.description: The list of nodes for this integration runtime.

scheduledUpdateDate.description: The date at which the integration runtime will be scheduled to update, in ISO8601 format.

updateDelayOffset.description: The time in the date scheduled by service to update the integration runtime, e.g., PT03H is 3 hours

localTimeZoneOffset.description: The local time zone offset in hours.

capabilities.description: Object with additional information about integration runtime capabilities.

serviceUrls.description: The URLs for the services used in integration runtime backend service.

autoUpdate.description: Whether Self-hosted integration runtime auto update has been turned on.

versionStatus.description: Status of the integration runtime version.

pushedVersion.description: The version that the integration runtime is going to update to.

latestVersion.description: The latest version on download center.

autoUpdateETA.description: The estimated time when the self-hosted integration runtime will be updated.

InteractiveQuery.description: Interactive query properties of managed integration runtime.

autoTerminationMinutes.description: Auto termination minutes of interactive query.

ManagedIntegrationRuntimeStatusTypePrope.description: Managed integration runtime status type properties.

createTime.description: The time at which the integration runtime was created, in ISO8601 format.

authKey1.description: The primary integration runtime authentication key.

authKey2.description: The secondary integration runtime authentication key.

IntegrationRuntimeRegenerateKeyParameter.description: Parameters to regenerate the authentication key.

keyName.description: The name of the authentication key to regenerate.

EnableInteractiveQueryForIntegrationRunt.description: The request of enabling interactive query for integration runtime.

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of results, if any remaining results exist.

count.description: The count of managed virtual networks.

ManagedVirtualNetworkProperties.description: The properties of managed virtual network.

vNetId.description: The ID of the VNet that this integration runtime will join.

alias.description: The alias of managed virtual network.

ManagedPrivateEndpointList.description: A list of managed private endpoint resources.

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of results, if any remaining results exist.

count.description: The count of managed private endpoints.

ManagedPrivateEndpointProperties.description: The properties of managed private endpoint.

fqdns.description: The fqdns of managed private endpoint.

items.description: The fqdn items of managed private endpoint.

groupId.description: The group identifier of managed private endpoint.

privateLinkResourceId.description: The private link resource identifier of managed private endpoint.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of managed private endpoint.

actionsRequired.description: ActionsRequired for a private link connection

description.description: Description of a private link connection

status.description: Status of a private link connection

KeyVaultSecretAccountKeyCredentialTypePr.description: properties of key vault secret account key credential type

AccountKeyAuthAzureKeyVaultCredential.description: Credential type that uses Account Key for authentication.

KeyVaultSecretUserPassCredentialTypeProp.description: properties of key vault secret user pass credential type

BasicAuthAzureKeyVaultCredential.description: Credential type that uses Basic authentication.

RoleARNCredential.description: Credential type that uses Account ID, External ID and Role ARN for authentication.

ServicePrincipalAzureKeyVaultCredential.description: Credential type that uses Tenant ID and Service principal ID for authentication.

SqlAuthAzureKeyVaultCredential.description: Credential type that uses Sql for authentication.

ConsumerKeyAuthAzureKeyVaultCredential.description: Credential type that uses consumer provided key and secret for authentication.

DelegatedAuthAzureKeyVaultCredential.description: Credential type that uses Client ID for authentication.

ManagedIdentityAzureKeyVaultCredential.description: Credential type that uses User assigned managed identities for authentication.

endpoint.name: endpoint
endpoint.description: The scanning endpoint of your purview account. Example: https://{accountName}.purview.azure.com
